name: World of TOS
short_description: I have plenty of ideas in my head, dreams and story lines that I have made up over all years of my life but I do not have all the skills needed to pursue these dreams of mine and I am at a real rough spot in my life where I am just trying to keep going and find a will to live so I decided to try and make this an sourceforge project and reach out to the community for help, I need good web and game programmers that want to be part of this project, I would like to make a great online rpg but unlike any other, I also would like to write a book and a movie, (have a great story for that though need some help to make it complete and make it a book and or movie) Note that whoever becomes a part of this project will not just get credit but this will be OUR project not just mine and though a lot of this I plan to make open source, I do however hope to make some money off of releasing a finished product(s), imagine all of us (me and whoever helps on this project) making a hit movie?
